website_summaries.verdict: Portable design. Hours of fun at about half the price of competitors. The best value available.
pros: Portable, affordable, and versatile with a storage bag
Lightweight design is easy to carry and can be used indoors and out
Easy to set up and disassemble
cons: The bags are small, though this enhances portability
Material isn't as rugged as some other boards

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, compact and perfect for travel!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with the quality of the material and the product overall. It's very quick and easy to set up and stow away. I highly recommend this set. I have no complaints whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's not gonna ever be as good as the real wooden set you can get for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not gonna ever be as good as the real wooden set you can get for $$$. BUT! It is very entertaining and great for storing/taking on trips to the beach and road trips. I highly recommend. I also added some lights to attach to the back hole that illuminates the set for some evening fun. (SOLOMONE CAVALLI Set of 2 Cornhole Night Light...) You can't stick them in the corn hole, but in the vertically sitting hole that props the face at an angle is a perfect fit and still lights up your game.
customer_reviews.author: AustinNewYork

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to store/carry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for upcoming camping trip this weekend but we couldn't wait. So we played and both I and my wife love this thing. I was worried it might be little too flimsy but once it's tied with velcros it's really sturdy. And I don't understand all the complaints about not being able to fold them back into the bag. I watched the video review how to fold and it was not hard at all to just follow the instruction. I wish it came with more bean bags but it's okay. The bag is awesome too. I love this thing. I'm so looking forward to play this with my friends couple.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a corn hole game but didn’t want the heavy and expensive wooden games. This seems to fit the bill. My grandkids enjoyed playing it. I hope it holds up well. It seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dbshell

customer_reviews.title: Great Set - Not Sure It's Worth the High Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the parts of this game seems to be excellent (I bought it for an outdoor party, and so far that's the only time we have used it). I LOVE that it is collapsible, as I've only seen wood / plastic versions, and we do NOT have room to store those things! However, I'm certain the seller is collecting an exorbitant margin, as the materials are definitely not expensive, and the markup is clearly based on the collapse-ability of the product. SO, you have to decide if it's worth it to YOU. Were it not for this party, I would not have paid this much for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Beach fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Wanted a new game for the beach. Were water side for a week weather permitting 🤞each yr. I bring so much to the beach daily so portability is a must. Folds up small and zips up in a little bag. Fits rt in my wagon with everything else. Sets up quickly and has little stakes to hold it down when windy. Folding it up took a few times to master. I suggest figuring it out before you plan to use it as I did. Everyone loved playing but hating losing. I was undefeated this trip lol. Quality seems good so looking forward to yrs of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a work game night, and it was perfect. Very portable, easy to setup, and it was fun to play. It was easy to fold back up and put in the carrying bag too. It's basically a sun visor (the kind you put on your windshield) so the bean bags bounce. This helped my game, but definitely causes it to be a bit different than the wood version. I used it inside, so I couldn't use the stakes to hold them down, but I used some duct tape, and it worked perfectly. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B

customer_reviews.title: Himal Collapsible Portable Corn Hole Boards
customer_reviews.text: A WASTE OF MONEY. Truly a rip off. Should report to the Attorney General. Cheap materials, hard to fold up and it wasn't very large. I made a better model using a large brown box and cut out holes. for my adult party. Would not recommend or buy. Will end giving it to a child as a grab bag gift or donate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hit for my parents 60th wedding anniversary
customer_reviews.text: The great grand kids loved it, the 30 somethings loved it, the grand parents thought it was great to watch. We even used it in the hotel room prior to the event. Very sturdy and well made. It pops into shape...even though it seems like there is no way it will lay flat when you open it- it does lay perfect. Tricky to remember how to fold it back into the bag- but it does fit. It comes with 2 sets of 4 bean bags. (red and blue - I think)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun & close enough to wooden versions
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and was very easy to setup. Because of the cloth surface the bean bags bounce more than wood, sometimes bouncing off completely or sometimes bouncing into the hole. However, it is still close enough to the normal wooden version that this game is still enjoyable. They fit pretty easily back into the bag (though not as sleekly of course), and I recommend this set just to have on hand in a yard or camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little game!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so that our boys (ages 7-9) could get it out and set it up whenever they want to play. Set up is a breeze and it's also super easy (for the adults) to fold up and put away. I love that everything tucks neatly inside the carry case. I kinda wish I had splurged for a sturdy wooden set buuut overall I'm happy with this purchase. It's a convenient little set that takes up virtually no storage space and would even be great for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Small defect
customer_reviews.text: This would be five star but it came with one of the Velcro loops already detached. We ordered way ahead of time for an engagement party but then when we finally put it together, the loops are attached on most spots but not on one vital Spot with makes the “board” not work well. Would like this to be replaced or at least half replaced if possible. Will update the review if they reach out cuz the portability is great but we got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great idea,  but failed in action.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this overseas to play south my niece and nephew. Packed right into my suitcase without a problem and little space used. Assembly was easy and as others mentioned the bags slightly bounce than slide on surface, but kids had fun. The problem was packing it back in. Despite giving it the right twists and turns, I could not get them back into carry case and ended up permanently destroying the frames.
customer_reviews.author: Orangotango-in-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great and non-lethal party game for kids you don't know.
customer_reviews.text: I agreed to be one of the houses for my neighborhood progressive party. I had some fear in my heart about kids hyped up on sugar running around my house. A friend suggested croquet to have outdoor activities. In my mind I saw kids hit in the head by wooden balls going to the ER. I found this corn hole game on Amazon and thought what is the worst they can do with a bean bag. The happy kids stayed outside voluntarily with the corn hole game and required only casual adult supervision. Everyone at the party was able to have a great time. The game shrinks down to a reasonable size for easy storage. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. DECHAZAL

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, will buy more of these for gifts!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game to take to horse shows, camping, on the boat, and summer get togethers. Both the kids and adults have a blast. Of course it’s not the same as cornhole on a wooden board but this is just as fun! Plus you can set it up and play indoors! Folds up easy and compact. Once you attach the rings to the sides, it sits flat and is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this corn hole set!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable corn hole set! Easy to set up and put away. Have used on several camping trips (very addictive!) and the set is holding up very well. I was on the fence about buying wood boards or this set and am VERY glad I chose this over a heavy and bulky wood set. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousReviewer

customer_reviews.title: I waited and finally splurged and it was worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This set is really awesome! It works really well. Yes its more bouncy than the wood ones but are those portable? No! This is not so bouncy that the bags bounce off, nor do they slide much so you can really play a very fair game of cornhole using this set. Not to mention it folds down to nothing! Pretty easy to fold up although every once in a while it can give you a hard time but we always get the upper hand eventually. We take it camping and to our block party and friends houses.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two elementary kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to pack/unpack and perfect for travel games.
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our camping trips and it packs up easy and small. It's quick to get set up and has been quite durable for us. Love that it folds up so small for easy storage when you have limited space and is very light weight. The carry case is great for keeping things together when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for our football weekend with everyone at the house
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our football weekend with everyone at the house. Easy set up and includes everything you need to play in seconds. Very easy to store when done and comes in a great carry case. Material is super strong and I like the ripstop poly fabric makes this very durable. Company has a free extended warranty for just registering with them which I took advantage of. What I like with this set besides the portability is how you can play in the changing weather conditions and it won't harm the set vs. a standard wooden one that can warp. Very happy with this and already has several hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: One day at a time

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and buy a real wood corn-hole game ...
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money and buy a real wood corn-hole game. The board bounces the bean bag. Too much action compared to traditional boards.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vernice

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those camping trips with the family. It doesn't take up any space. and easy enough to fold back up and put back in the bag. I purchase some ring lights for night time games makes it more interesting!! Let the fun begin.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We are always on the lookout for easy and fun and convenient toys/games for the kids when we travel. This is easy to set up and take down. The lightweight bean bags stay on the boards much to our surprise. It's fun to play for both the little kids and even for us as the parents. And we love that it all folds up into a portable bag.
customer_reviews.author: mickey

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of those big bulky wood boards and go for these
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love them. Get them. They fold up and don’t take up a ton of room in the basement. They are amazing and sturdy and I feel like will be able to use them for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Getting it back into the case isnt easy and comes with cost.
customer_reviews.text: My kids broke my husbands wood set so I thought.. these can't be broken... which is semi true. While trying to follow the directions to put them in the carrying case the metal was twisted and now it doesn't stay open so well. It seemed like a great idea but they don't go back in the carrying case easily or without damaging the metal wires that hold it open.
customer_reviews.author: Pamella Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun portable junior size board
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer time fun with the kids. We use them indoors when it's still too hot to go outside. The bags are a good weight and size for this size board. Good to kill time. If you expect this to be competitive quality look somewhere else. They fold easily but not quite as small as you'd think. It is portable though; when folded it's larger than a frisbee in diameter and about as thick as a side of a board game box. However it's a bag and not a box so it's much easier to pack along and takes up less room.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Fun and compact!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases I made all summer. This set fits in a very small carrying case similar in size to a dinner plate. The game can be set up in just a min and is well made. I was doubtful how sturdy it would be once together but the three rings that velcro provides plenty of support for the top of the cornhole board. The stakes are also great for windy days. We had no issues with the game at all and found it perfect for backyard games and at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: Product started out good. However, as time went on it lost its sturdiness and now has a slight bend to it. I’ve Only have the product for six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. I would have returned if I could have packaged them up as they came. I got them for a big back yard BBQ I was having at my house. No one used the game or showed any interest in it. I’ll try to break it out next spring with my 13 and 9 year old boys, but I don’t have high hopes for the boys to be too excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great portability and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this. I work with individuals with developmental disabilities and with social distancing needs, I wanted an outdoor activity that would be easily taken from home to home. This set is great! It is lightweight and easily carried. It opens and sets up easily. It is made of high quality materials. Folding the "boards" up after can be a little challenging but they eventually work themselves out and fold well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jes P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $25 and a great travel game.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. YES it bounces SLIGHTLY, made out of NYLON people. If you are a backwards hat wearing, need legal sized boards and have your own custom made bags with your name embroidered on them, this $25 set is NOT for you. BUT if your looking for a nice game to take camping or take to the park, the $25 is well worth it. Yes it's tricky (especially after a couple) to fold up but not impossible and actually fun if you try race someone. Easier with each time.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you just want something portable. However it isn’t the size of a normal cornhole board and I feel like the kids like playing with it more than the adults. Got this to add to my collection of portable games to use for my meetup group. Would say they are a decent purchase if you don’t want to lug around the heavy boards and such.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the wood ones, but we still had fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great since it’s portable. Doesn’t lay nicely and is slightly crooked since you have to Velcro it. Took some time to try to get it to lay in a good angle to play. We still enjoyed it though. We don’t have a lot of storage room, so that was a plus that it was foldable. Took a bit to try to get it folded up into its bag when done playing. But that goes with anything you buy that is made of this type of material. Works great for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Family fun indoors or outside!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, particularly during this time! It can be played indoors or outside. I purchased a few more games recently to add to our collection. We are spending even more time together as a family and making the most of it! Stay home and stay safe all!
customer_reviews.author: RileyCS

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up! Took me a couple of trys to fold it back but i got figured out. Can't wait to use it at the beach this weekend along with the bucketball I purchased as well. I will update afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for my family ages 6 to 66
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for my family ages 6 to 66. Soft and easy to pack away. Easy to set up. Colors are bright and festive. Indoor outdoor yes! Recommend it you like fun gaming with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sturner

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for traditional corn hole set
customer_reviews.text: When do do not want to carry a traditional wood corn hole set, this is almost as good. It is very portable, comes with a nice carrying case, and is easy to assemble and use. For being collapsible, it is good quality - it holds the bean bags well and also offers some bounce, but not too much. When you need a portable corn hole set, this is just about perfect. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Portable fun in an easy carry pack
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and super portable. I now keep it in my picnic pack for spontaneous fun in the park or at the beach. Even great for indoors to entertain friends and their kids if weather is unfriendly.
customer_reviews.author: BonWil

customer_reviews.title: Good for a outside party
customer_reviews.text: We had a birthday party outside and got one of these to use for the kids. It popped out of the bag and flew across the room lol We had a bit of a challenge getting back in there later. Over all it was fun to use and seems Ike it is a decent quality too!
customer_reviews.author: DJ D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight (small and light)
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for camping, travel, etc. So small and lightweight! A fun new camping game aside from just cards to get people playing and talking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUCH SMALLER THAN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable cornhole game that I could take to the beach and various places. However, when I opened it I was shocked at how small the boards actually were and the bean bags themselves. The bean bags are HALF the size of a normal cornhole bag. It's worth it to spend a little bit more and actually get something that is enjoyable for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for the beach and they were perfect. The bags are tiny but the board is also a lot smaller than a regular cornhole set. The “board” is bouncy but I wasn’t expecting wood quality. It is v shaped so we just added sand between the bottom and top and it didn’t blow away. Didn’t even need the stakes. So happy with this set and would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable cornhole set. I was looking to add some games to my daughter's outdoor birthday party, and this fit the bill. It's smaller than the typical cornhole boards, but that makes sense given it's portable and about 1/3 the cost of a wooden set. It's great quality and is plenty big enough to play on. The kids and adults all loved this, and one of my friends is now buying one for her yard. Definitely a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Portable corn hole 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bf for Christmas. It is cheaper then the wooden ones and great because you can bring to the beach/camping ect. And it’s easy to clean and lightweight. Even able to play it in the apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Losowski

customer_reviews.title: Big ups to the manufacturers of this set
customer_reviews.text: Dude! I’m inspired to review very few products. Even great ones! But THIS guy warranted a moment. Everything about this set is awesome. It’s surprisingly sturdy, unfolds to almost full sized boards, and bags and boards are treated with something that even prevents the bags from sliding across the board! Couldn’t possibly be happier with this set. Excited to take it on tons of camping and beach trips.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D.

customer_reviews.title: Game Playability and Cost
customer_reviews.text: The corn hole game was as described. Enjoyed playing in yard. Plastic spikes held well and seem sturdy enough altough would have preferred metal stakes. Fun and sturdy for folding/portable game.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Eatinger

customer_reviews.title: Compact, fun and high quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this set for camping. In fact so much, we just set it up at the house. The extra bounce makes the game even more fun. Great quality, easy to set up and compact carrying. Fantastic buy for those who like to take their corn hole with them on the road. And, for those who want a little bounce and challenge while playing at home.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: these worked just fine in the carport since I didn't want to spend a lot (or store something big), was a fun afternoon. Just need to put something inside the "boards" so they don't move all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Perica

customer_reviews.title: Saves storage space and well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 sets to use for our church youth group. They take up very little space to store which will be a plus. We will weight them down to use indoors but there are stakes included when used outdoors. They were a bit challenging to fold up the first try, but hoping that gets better with practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for young ones
customer_reviews.text: It’s just ok, but it did ship on time, and was everything it said it was, I think I was just wanting it to somehow not be so flimsy, but on the bright side little ones don’t know no better so its still fun for the small kids
customer_reviews.author: Trent citte

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this portable corn hole game is pretty great. It folds up and bounces back into shape. Great for travel or someone who just doesn't have a lot of room. The kids liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Mabluvsmew

customer_reviews.title: Just as it appears
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good for a travel if you don't have space to take real boards, but don't expect to get a decent game in if you're competitive! This set definitely appeals to the younger kids. After we unfolded them, it's like they are permanently bent to one side. Likely because of the fold they're in. Not terrible. Just not as sturdy as I would have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: The BEST cornhole set, stores easy!
customer_reviews.text: How neat is this? The most economical corn hole set I’ve seen! Cheapest being $100. Another bonus is that I don’t need a large, dry space for storage. Lightweight, folds flat and fits inside of its own travel/storage bag. Great to pull out when we have visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: A must for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Very excited for this! I love that I can bring this anywhere. Very easy to set up and store (will probably be stored in my car hahah). This thing will get a lot of use and will bring a lot joy to any party/family gathering this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Recommend watching the video someone else posted
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the purchase. Light weight but took a few to get the hang of putting them up. I’d say 4.5 stars! Look forward to using it at the beach. Recommend watching the video someone else posted below
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis Lecker

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, but nothing like the wooden version.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun but its nothing close to the real game made from wood. The surface doesn’t allow the bags to slide and the bags bounce off the surface often. Nonetheless, it’s fun to play it outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: BFD Club

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great game to play with family and friends! My daughter and whole family love it. Even my mother and she never participated in games before! It's just so easy to bring anywhere because it's portable and lightweight. The quality is also great for the bendable material it is. This was definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Took me awhile to figure out how to fold it back but nobody else had a problem. The direction is confusing but YouTube helps. But again, others people folded it up no problem and once I did it a couple of times...no problem. Fun to play and love the bounce that it gives. Very portable. Family loves it. Everything is well made. Good purchase and great to store in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Easy transport, fun game!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wedding, as we wanted to have some yard games to play. We used it in a damp/wet forest and it was perfect for that setting. It is different getting used to the bounce of the bags on this surface vs. a traditional wood set, but it was still fun to play! Plus, it's way easier to transport than a wood set which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: IN THE HOLE SHE GOES!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor Corn Hole game has brought so much excitement to the kids that, with all the rain we have been having, we have been playing Corn Hole in the house. So much fun and excitement for ALL to enjoy, grown ups and kids alike.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: but it’s great for it’s portability
customer_reviews.text: Seems flimsy putting it together and it’s not quite as durable as the wood ones, but it’s great for it’s portability, it’s quite sturdy once set up and provides for a good time!! Easy to fold. Feels strange folding it the first couple of times, but then you find it will kind of naturally go into place when you twist and then just squish it together!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient. Can take anywhere and kids and adults love it. I put glow in the dark tape around edges so we even use at night!
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Its a bit light so if its windy we have to put something heavy to hold it down but it's a fun game and the kids have a blast
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat take anywhere game. It folds up to throw in the car . Its a bit light so if its windy we have to put something heavy to hold it down but it's a fun game and the kids have a blast!
customer_reviews.author: P. B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, fun entertainment.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough, good quality material and bright color. It would have been nice if scoring the game rules had been included. Still I am very happy with my purchade.
customer_reviews.author: Sally DiVecchia

customer_reviews.title: Great for family fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for the family. We have played for the past two weeks and had a really good time. The cornhole boards are flexible and bouncy due how they are made compared to wooden boards, but it just adds to the fun. I love this and the family was having a great time!
customer_reviews.author: ASPC

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take with us on camping trips. I was pleased to see that everything was as advertised when I received the item. We’ve played several times and they’re easy to set up and take down. Small for storing in a camper with limited space. We’ve been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. SCHAAL

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for camping friends
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend who loves camping. It’s a good size and easy to carry. Felt sturdy and quality material. Not too heavy either. Doesn’t take up much space which makes it perfect for camping or keeping in your car. Definitely makes for a fun gift!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Too “corny” too be true
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to have this product for beach trips and family get-together. However, the “boards” don’t sit flush on the ground and one frame twists so the bean bags slide off the sides. I should have just gotten regular cornhole.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brink

customer_reviews.title: Finally un damaged package
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived in an un damage box this time the product seem to be in good condition and the size of the items meet what I saw when ordering so I am finally pleased with my purchase thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: The angle isnt up to regulations and the give is kinda bad. But it does the job for now. DONT USE REGULAR BEAN BAGS, THEY ARE TOO HEAVY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Chu

customer_reviews.title: May be better for children
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations. It didn’t fold as easily as they said it would and the upper surface is not as.taut as it should be. The surface was wrinkled and some what loose and if someone pitched a bag lower on the board anything higher up on the board would slide backwards. Just wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Great item -keep little ones away though.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition to have due to portability. Easy to set up and put away. Not so great if toddlers running 'over' it though. Used it at a party and they loved walking/running on top of it. Broke one of the rings. It's still usable but sadly, the set up is a bit lopsided now. Otherwise, it's still a great product. Hence, the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Fun portable game
customer_reviews.text: We took this camping and everyone enjoyed playing it. It seemed sturdy enough and the bean bags seemed to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: these do not fold back properly at all. I purchased 2 each for a company picnic event. Thankfully I opened and tried the sets before the event. The frames on two of them got all bent upon attempting to close them; the other two, I was able to fold but not completely so that fit back into the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: ZM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Classrooms
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a great reward and a fun activity to do in my middle school classrooms! I suggest using books to keep them in place on the smooth classroom surface. The bean bags could be made better. The stitching has come undone on two of the bags. Some students initially complained about the lighter bags compared to standard cornhole bean bags, but once they adjusted, their competitive natures took over and resulted in fun mini-tournament experiences in my class! If you want a fun and kinesthetic activity for students, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Roth

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game for the beach! Very light weight and easy to fold up. Has a bit of a bounce which can help or hurt your throw. Perfect game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry anywhere, set up and store
customer_reviews.text: Great portability and loads of fun with the grandkids. Fast to set up and fold up to the storage bag. There’s a bounce to deal with that isn’t in those constructed of wood but that didn’t detract at all from us having a blast! We recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LS Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and fold away
customer_reviews.text: These portable cornhole boards are easy to collapse and set up. They come with plastic stakes to hold them in place during a game. I love being able to put them in their small carrying bag and store them when not in use. They easily set up for quick backyard games.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and portable!
customer_reviews.text: This set is wonderful. It is durable, but fits into a single easy to carry pouch about the size of a large dinner plate. I bought it for a 2 &4 year old, but it is perfect for adults, too! Easy to store and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Shes A Kick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and a excellent game to play on the lawn or at the beach
customer_reviews.author: John B. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who is in a cornhole league. These aren't regulation size but I knew they wouldn't be. He loved it and it'll be a fun addition to camp outs and outside events. Not heavy to carry and they pop up and refold easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lea H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a quick day of backyard games for my teens and young adults. We had a great time. Set up was easy and once we figured out how to fold it back up, the game fit neatly back into the bag and is easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Folds up small, easy to play.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken it out twice now to give kids something to do. It travels well and us easy to fold back up and put away. It’s a fun portable game. I wouldn’t have a corn hole tournament with it but it’s entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Karenw

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool game to bring to the beach or camping. Completely portable and easy to set up. Not too sturdy as the bean bags tend to bounce off instead of sliding but what do you expect? Still so fun! I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Burford

customer_reviews.title: Too bouncy
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and this was rated #1. Grandson loved playing on wooden game boards , but did not like this at all - too bouncy. Played once and it has not been brought out again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: About 75 percent happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the grandkids, not sure if an adult that has used a wooden set would love it. But it’s fun to have in a pinch! Easy to assemble, not as sturdy as I had hoped for. Easy storage, great for the campground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and super easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: We love this little guy! Different game than corn hole, really, because of the bounce. But, everyone who has played it has enjoyed it and most like the bounce factor - requires a different skill!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Durst

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This is better for someone who camps than for normal yard use. The kids confiscated it from me for their camping trips, which was just as well because I didn't like it for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. An inexpensive and compact alternative to standard corn hole. Works well. Can't wait to take this on camping trips and to outdoor get togethers once it is safe to do so.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this except I was unable to re- collapse to fit in the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Petras

customer_reviews.title: Great portable product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to take with us to the beach. It served the purpose, we had fun. It's not too sturdy, but that's expected. Doesn't take much storage space, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great gift for just about anyone in your list!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Can use in the backyard, on the beach, in the park and when we go camping. Would make a great gift for any young adult or anyone that likes to have fun!!!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dirosario

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun outside thing for my four year olds to do. It got great reviews. Compact, easy to set up. Would be great for home, camping or carting to grandmas house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, portable cornhole set
customer_reviews.text: This cornhole set has been amazing for quarantine— we’ve taken it to parks, used it inside the house, etc. And it folds up really small, so it’s so easy to store away in our tiny basement. I’m sure we’ll continue taking it places whenever things are back to normal. Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Radioagony

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses expectations and very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and take down, very portable and light, small when in the bag. This is a lot better than lugging around some heavy wooden set. Easy for camping, cook outs, or picnics. It's not even as flimsy as I expected at all when set up. Great all around.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Butler

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with the quality and so easy to set up and so fun to use!!! I little tricky getting them back in their travel pocket, but easy once you figure it out! Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shiplama

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard or on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Great backyard game, especially for kids! Would make a great addition to a beach or camping trip, birthday party, cookout, something fun for the kids -- and adults too! The smaller bean bags are perfect size for my 5 year old granddaughter to handle, as well as adults. The bean bags do bounce a bit on the surface depending on the toss, but that didn't bother us. Lots of fun the very first time we used it!
customer_reviews.author: akaMimi

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So much fun. Not like a traditional wood board of course cause there is bounce to the bag hitting the fabric but it adds another layer of fun to it.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold up and take on trips. The bags are small and light weight so the wind will carry them away. For the price and easiness of putting it and taking it down it’s a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Schnulo

customer_reviews.title: Boards are tough to stay firm indoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with the idea of putting it inside since in a description, it says it can be used inside or out. When I set mine up inside, the boards seemed very flimsy and the bags would all slide to the bottom of the board. Might be that I set the boards up wrong indoors, but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brett N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you want to take them with you or don’t want to leave them out in your yard. They are easy to put up and put away. I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: pmb

product_meta.title: Himal Collapsible Portable Corn Hole Boards With 8 Cornhole Bean Bags (3 x 2-feet)
feature_bullets: [INNOVATION DESIGN] Exclusive innovative design, this Bean Bag Game can be assembled very quickly by flicking and sticking and stored very easy by tearing and stacking with a small footprint and meeting every needs in the portable travel.

[LIGHT WEIGHT AND PORTABLE] With a weight of 2 kg and a length of 11inch*11inch*4inch after folding, this Corn Hole Boards are more lightweight and portable than other Cornhole Game in the market. A handy and funny Bean Bag Toss Game in indoor, outdoor and travelling activities.

[STRONG AND DURABLE] Made by the high elastic flat wire, which can be folded for more than 1000 times.Fabrics with anti-skid treatment handle the issue of bags skid on surface effectively.By 300D poly fabric makes it durable and tear-resistant.
[MOST COST-EFFECTIVE] Two 3' x 2' Cornhole Boards(Non-match size), 8 CornHole Bags and carrying case.All Cornhole Game pieces included.
[EXTENSIBLE WARRANTY] Join Himal Care to extend your Bean Toss Game warranty for FREE.
